<li>2.1 系统微分方程的经典解</li>

<h1 id="21-系统微分方程的经典解">2.1 系统微分方程的经典解</h1>
<h2 id="微分方程的基本概念">微分方程的基本概念</h2>
<p>对于单输入单输出的<span class="math inline">\(LIT\)</span>连续系统来说，描述其输入-输出关系 的数学模型是<span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶常系数线性微分方程，一般形式为：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[a_{n}y^{(n)}(t)+a_{n-1}y^{(n-1)}(t)+\dots+a_{1}y'(t)+a_{0}y(t)=b_{m}e^{(m)}(t)+b_{m-1}e^{(m-1)}(t)+\dots+b_{1}e'(t)+b_{0}e(t)
\]</div><p></p><p></p><div class="math display">\[\sum_{i=0}^{n}a_{i}y^{(i)}(t)=\sum_{j=0}^{m}b_{j}e^{(j)}(t)
\]</div><p></p><ul>
<li>初始条件：<span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶系统在<span class="math inline">\(t=0\)</span>时候接入激励，响应在<span class="math inline">\(t=0_{+}\)</span>时刻的值：
<ul>
<li>初始条件表示激励接入后的瞬间</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[y^{(j)}(0_{+})\ (j=0,1,2,\dots,n-1)
\]</div><p></p><ul>
<li>初始状态：<span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶系统在激励 没有接入的<span class="math inline">\(t=0\)</span>时刻的响应值，该 值反映了系统的历史情况，与激励无关：
<ul>
<li>初始状态表示激励接入前的瞬间</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[y^{(j)}(0_{-})\ (j=0,1,2,\dots,n-1)
\]</div><p></p><h2 id="微分方程的经典解">微分方程的经典解</h2>
<h3 id="齐次解">齐次解<span class="math inline">\(y_{h}(t)\)</span></h3>
<ul>
<li>微分方程右侧为零时称为齐次方程，即<span class="math inline">\(\sum_{i=0}^{n}a_{i}y^{(i)}(t)=0\)</span></li>
<li>齐次解指齐次方程的解，只由<strong>系统的特征根</strong>决定</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="阶微分方程的齐次解"><span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶微分方程的齐次解</h4>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[y^{(n)}(t)+a_{n-1}y^{(n-1)}(t)+\dots+a_{0}y(t)=0
\]</div><p></p><p>特征方程：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[\lambda^{n}+a_{n-1}+\lambda^{n-1}+\dots+a_{1}\lambda+a_{0}=0
\]</div><p></p><p>其中<span class="math inline">\(\lambda_{i}\)</span>为方程的<strong>特征根</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>特征根均为单根：<span class="math inline">\(y_{h}(t)=\sum_{i=1}^{n}C_{i}e^{\lambda_{i}t}=C_{1}e^{\lambda_{1}t}+C_{2}e^{\lambda_{2}t}+\dots+C_{n}e^{\lambda_{n}t}\)</span></li>
<li>特征根含有<span class="math inline">\(r\)</span>重根<span class="math inline">\(\lambda_{i}\)</span>：<span class="math inline">\(r\)</span>重根对应<span class="math inline">\((C_{1}t^{r-1}+C_{2}t^{r-2}+\dots+C_{r-1}t+C_{r})e^{\lambda_{i}t}\)</span></li>
<li>特征根 含共轭复根<span class="math inline">\(\lambda_{1,2}=\alpha\pm j\beta\)</span>：共轭复根对应的解为：
<ul>
<li><span class="math inline">\(e^{\alpha t}[C_{1}\cos \beta t+C_{2}\sin \beta t]\)</span></li>
<li><span class="math inline">\(Ae^{\alpha t}\cos(\beta t-\theta),Ae^{j\theta}=C_{1}+jC_{2}\)</span>（辅助角公式）</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="阶微分方程的特解"><span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶微分方程的特解<span class="math inline">\(y_{p}(t)\)</span></h4>
<h5 id="形如">形如<span class="math inline">\(y''+py'+qy=e^{\lambda x}P_{m}(x)\)</span>：</h5>
<p>设特解形如：<span class="math inline">\(y^{*}=x^{k}e^{\lambda x}Q_{m}(x)\)</span><br>
其中<span class="math inline">\(Q_{m}(x)\)</span>为一个待定的<span class="math inline">\(m\)</span>次多项式</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[k=
\begin{cases}
0\ ,\ \lambda不是特征根\\ \\
1\ ,\ \lambda是单特征根\\ \\
2\ ,\ \lambda是二重特征根
\end{cases}
\]</div><p></p><p>将<span class="math inline">\(y^{*}\)</span>回带原微分方程确定系数即可</p>
<h5 id="形如-1">形如<span class="math inline">\(y''+py'+qy=e^{\lambda x}[P_{l}(x)\cos \omega x+P_{n}(x)\sin \omega x]\)</span>：</h5>
<p>设特解形如<span class="math inline">\(y^{*}=x^{k}e^{\lambda x}[Q_{1}(x)\cos \omega x+Q_{2}(x)\sin \omega x]\)</span><br>
其中<span class="math inline">\(Q_{1}(x),Q_{2}(x)\)</span>为待定<span class="math inline">\(m\)</span>次多项式，<span class="math inline">\(m=max\{ l,n \}\)</span></p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[k=\begin{cases}
0\ ,\ \lambda\pm j\omega不是特征根\\ \\
1\ ,\ \lambda\pm j\omega是特征根
\end{cases}
\]</div><p></p><p>将<span class="math inline">\(y^{*}\)</span>回带原微分方程确定系数即可</p>
<h4 id="阶微分方程的全解"><span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶微分方程的全解<span class="math inline">\(y(t)\)</span></h4>
<ul>
<li><span class="math inline">\(y(t)=y_{h}(t)+y_{p}(t)\)</span></li>
<li>此时齐次解中还有待定系数<span class="math inline">\(C_{i}\)</span>，<span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>阶微分方程需要利用<span class="math inline">\(n\)</span>个初始条件<span class="math inline">\(y(0_{+}),y'(0_{+}),\dots,y^{(n-1)}(0_{+})\)</span>来确定</li>
<li>齐次解<span class="math inline">\(y_{h}(t)\)</span>又被称作自由响应</li>
<li>特解<span class="math inline">\(y_{p}(t)\)</span>又被称作强迫响应</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="自由响应与强迫响应">自由响应与强迫响应</h3>
<ul>
<li>自由响应：仅与<strong>系统本身特性</strong>有关，而与激励的形式无关，其次解仅与系统特征根有关，特征根成为系统的“固有频率”，齐次解常称为系统的<strong>固有响应</strong>或<strong>自由响应</strong></li>
<li>强迫响应：与<strong>激励的函数形式</strong>有关，特解的形式与激励的形式有关，常称为强迫响应</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="暂态响应和稳态响应">暂态响应和稳态响应</h3>
<ul>
<li>
<p>暂态响应：指响应中<strong>暂时出现</strong>的分量，随着时间增长<span class="math inline">\(t\to \infty\)</span>，它将消失<span class="math inline">\(\to 0\)</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>稳态响应：指<strong>稳定</strong>的分量，常以阶跃函数<span class="math inline">\(\varepsilon(t)\)</span>和周期函数<span class="math inline">\(\sin \omega t,\cos \omega t\)</span>等形式存在</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>对于<span class="math inline">\(LTI\)</span>连续系统的微分方程<span class="math inline">\(y''(t)+5y'(t)+6y(t)=\varepsilon(t)\)</span>以及全响应<span class="math inline">\(y(t)=-e^{-2t}+3\)</span></p>
<ul>
<li>暂态响应为<span class="math inline">\(-e^{-2t}\)</span>，稳态响应为<span class="math inline">\(3\)</span></li>
<li>自由响应为<span class="math inline">\(-e^{-2t}\)</span>，强迫响应为<span class="math inline">\(3\)</span></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="初始状态和初始条件的讨论">初始状态和初始条件的讨论</h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3677788/202508/3677788-20250825164034542-1893135720.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>实际中，往往先得知系统的初始状态，即先得知激励接入前系统的历史信息</li>
<li>由于激励的接入，从<span class="math inline">\(0_{-}\)</span>时刻过渡到<span class="math inline">\(0_{+}\)</span>时刻之后，初始状态和初始条件往往不一样，我们用<strong>跳变量</strong>表示这个变化</li>
<li>求解微分方程需要从已知的初始状态<span class="math inline">\(y^{(j)}(0_{-})\)</span>求得初始条件<span class="math inline">\(y^{(j)}(0_{+})\)</span></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="基本思路">基本思路</h3>
<ul>
<li>如果激励加入后，在方程右端出现<span class="math inline">\(\delta(t)\)</span>及其各阶导数，则在方程左端也应有与之对应的<span class="math inline">\(\delta(t)\)</span>及其各阶导数项，使方程两段平衡</li>
<li>冲激函数的产生，意味着方程左端<span class="math inline">\(y^{d(i)}(t)\)</span>中的某些项在<span class="math inline">\(t=0\)</span>处有阶跃的跳变</li>
<li>两种求解初始条件的主要方法：<strong>待定系数法</strong>和<strong>冲激平衡法</strong>，后续做题主要使用后者</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="例">例</h3>
<p>某<span class="math inline">\(LTI\)</span>连续系统的微分方程为<span class="math inline">\(y''(t)+4y'(t)+3y(t)=e''(t)+2e'(t)+e(t)\)</span>，已知系统激励<span class="math inline">\(e(t)=\varepsilon(t)\)</span>，系统的初始状态为<span class="math inline">\(y(0_{-})=0,y'(0_{-})=1\)</span>，试求系统的初始条件<span class="math inline">\(y(0_{+}),y'(0_{+})\)</span></p>
<h4 id="法1待定系数法">法1：待定系数法</h4>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[\begin{align}
&amp;设y''(t)=\delta'(t)+a\delta(t)+\varepsilon(t)\\ \\
&amp;积分得y'(t)=\delta(t)+a\varepsilon(t)\quad y(t)=\varepsilon(t)\\ \\
&amp;带入原微分方程,只关注冲激项得:\\  \\
&amp;\delta'(t)+(4+a)\delta(t)=\delta'(t)+2\delta(t)\\ \\
&amp;对比得4+a=2\to a=-2\\ \\
&amp;则\begin{cases}
y'(t)=\delta(t)-2\varepsilon(t)\\ \\
y(t)=\varepsilon(t)
\end{cases}\\ \\
&amp;\begin{cases}
y'(0_{+})=y'(0_{-})+y_{e}'(0_{+})=1-2=-1\\ \\
y(0_{+})=y(0_{-})+y_{e}(0_{+})=0+1=1
\end{cases}
\end{align}
\]</div><p></p><h4 id="法2冲激平衡阵列">法2：冲激平衡阵列</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3677788/202508/3677788-20250825164043438-1801128736.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
